newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: TOWLES EDGAR JACOBS SAYS IN TALKS.
newsitem.headline: TOWLES EDGAR JACOBS SAYS IN TALKS.

text.p: Towles, Edgar Jacobs Ltd, a clothing manufacturer, said on Thursday it was currently in talks which could affect the company's share price.
The company said in a cautionary annoucement that shareholders should exercise caution in their share dealings until further notice.
